item.title: Ultra-wide Spoon
item.description: Ultra-wide monitors With the big push for ultra-wide monitors, and the M-Series MacBook Air only supporting one external monitor, I chose to change to an ultra-wide monitor at my desk. I’m not gonna lie, I hated it at first. It seemed to be such a waste of space when fullscreening apps, and as we all know, window management on macOS is lackluster at best, unless you’re full screening apps, which is something I rarely need to do.
